remarks: Multiplicative property of first (inner product) argument.  (Contributed by NM, 11-Jun-2015.)
statement:
hdmaplnm1.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
hdmaplnm1.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
hdmaplnm1.v $e |- V = ( Base ` U ) $.
hdmaplnm1.t $e |- .x. = ( .s ` U ) $.
hdmaplnm1.r $e |- R = ( Scalar ` U ) $.
hdmaplnm1.b $e |- B = ( Base ` R ) $.
hdmaplnm1.m $e |- .X. = ( .r ` R ) $.
hdmaplnm1.s $e |- S = ( ( HDMap ` K ) ` W ) $.
hdmaplnm1.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
hdmaplnm1.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. V ) $.
hdmaplnm1.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. V ) $.
hdmaplnm1.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. B ) $.
hdmaplnm1 $p |- ( ph -> ( ( S ` Y ) ` ( A .x. X ) ) = ( A .X. ( ( S ` Y ) ` X ) ) ) $.
